settings.title: Why Choose Relievet CBD Oil for Pets?
settings.text: Like CBD products for humans, hemp CBD for dogs and cats is a non-psychoactive compound.  Cannabidiol (CBD) is just one of dozens of chemical compounds derived from the Cannabis sativa plant, but unlike some others (namely THC), it has no psychoactive effects.  This means you can provide your pets with all the benefits of this miraculous plant, without any unwanted side effects.

settings.title: Our Mission
settings.text: Relievet provides pet owners with products they can trust to do the best for their pet family. We do this by using the highest quality natural ingredients, thoroughly testing our products and drawing from our years of experience volunteering and working with animals in veterinary practices.

settings.title: Our Pet Success Stories with CBD

settings.section_title: Healthy Pets Use Hemp CBD Oil
settings.text:
The healing, health, and wellness properties of CBD can no longer be denied, and the growing market for CBD products has led to untold opportunities for people to improve their lives.  Why shouldn’t our beloved cats and dogs enjoy the same benefits with CBD for pets? Read more

Pets improve our lives and become members of the family.  Unfortunately, they can suffer just as we do from accidents, illnesses, and a variety of pain symptoms.  With the right CBD oil for dogs, cats, and other pets, you have the opportunity to relieve their suffering and improve their lives.  What conditions can be treated with hemp CBD for pets?  How can you find safe and effective products?

At Relievet, we have the solutions you seek.  Our products are made using only organically cultivated hemp, and every batch undergoes extensive lab testing to ensure safety and consistency, as well as a completely non-psychoactive experience for your pet.  When you need products you can trust, Relievet delivers with CBD oil for cats and dogs that is safe, effective, and reliable.

Read less

settings.section_title: Why Choose Relievet CBD Oil for Pets?
settings.text:
Like CBD products for humans, hemp CBD for dogs and cats is a non-psychoactive compound. Cannabidiol (CBD) is just one of dozens of chemical compounds derived from the Cannabis sativa plant, but unlike some others (namely THC), it has no intoxicating effects. This means you can provide your pets with all the benefits of this miraculous plant, without any unwanted side effects.

Shop Now

You love the animals in your household and you don’t want them to suffer. With the right hemp CBD for cats and dogs, you can help bring balance to your beloved pets. Support a life free of pain, anxiety, and other issues that plague them.

Ask us a question about CBD

settings.section_title: Quality Hemp CBD for Canines, Cats, and More!
settings.text:
Choosing the right CBD for dogs and cats can be difficult. Although the industry is expanding and controls are being put into place to regulate production, finding the right products can be a confusing and frustrating process.

At Relievet, we strive to provide the transparency you need to make an informed decision. Our products are made with 100% natural, organic hemp and are guaranteed cruelty-free. We undergo third-party lab testing to ensure consistent, safe, and effective products every time, and we provide the results online for full transparency.

When you choose hemp CBD oil for cats and dogs, you want the best for your best friend. You want to alleviate suffering and promote optimal health and wellness. At Relievet, we share your goals and values, which is why we go out of our way to create high-quality, trusted products we’d give to our own pets.

settings.section_title: Proper CBD Dosing for Your Pet’s Size
settings.text:
When used properly, CBD for pets can provide your cat or dog with relief from a variety of symptoms, including pain, inflammation, anxiety, and more.  However, you first have to dial in the right dosage for your pet’s size and symptoms.

While product packaging offers dosing guidelines, you can also turn to our handy online dosage calculator to determine precise dosing for your pet’s needs, based on size/weight and symptoms.  Whether you have a 12-pound cat suffering from anxiety or a 90-pound dog with arthritis, we’ll help you find the right dose to improve your beloved pet’s quality of life.

Read More

It is recommended that you administer doses every eight hours or as needed.  Start with a small amount to ensure that your pet can tolerate the dosage and then increase as needed to treat symptoms.  Do not exceed the recommended dosage.  If your pet accidentally ingests more than recommended, contact your vet, just as you would with any unintended consumption.

With the proper administration of CBD for pets, your furry friends will enjoy symptom relief without the negative side effects frequently associated with pharmaceutical medications.  Although CBD oil is not a cure, it can be used as an alternative or supplemental treatment to address a wide range of symptoms.

Read Less

settings.section_title: CBD Product Types for your Pet
settings.text:
Relievet is pleased to offer a variety of products that specifically deliver CBD for pets.  We cater to both cats and dogs with CBD oil, treats, and topicals.  This gives you the opportunity to choose the perfect products for your pet’s particular needs.

If you’re looking for a way to deliver whole-body benefits, either continuously or on an as-needed basis, you’ll find that our CBD oil for pets provides the comprehensive solution you seek, with a range of tinctures based on your pet’s type and size.

Read More
For dogs, you can choose from:+
  • CBD Oil for Small Dogs (1-15 lbs.) – 150mg
  • CBD Oil for Medium-sized Dogs (16-40 lbs.) – 400mg
  • CBD Oil for Large Dogs (41-90 lbs.) – 800mg
  • CBD Oil for Extra Large Dogs (91-150 lbs.) – 1500mg
We also have CBD oil products for cats of varying sizes, including:+
  • CBD Oil for Cats (1-15 lbs.) – 150mg
  • CBD Oil for Large Cats (1-40 lbs.) – 400mg

These products are made in the USA with 100% natural, non-GMO, hemp-derived CBD and they are THC-free so you never have to worry about intoxicating effects.  Relievet CBD for pets is laboratory tested and results are posted online so you can always verify cannabinoid content and ensure that your pets receive safe, effective, and consistent symptom relief.

We also offer CBD Soft Chews made with THC-free, organic, broad-spectrum hemp extract from Colorado.  These delicious, natural bacon flavored treats are veterinarian formulated and deliver 2mg CBD per treat, for times when your dog needs a little extra relief.

Finally, we’re pleased to offer CBD Soothing Balm for your dog’s skin.  Plenty of pooches suffer from itching and hot spots related to allergies, skin conditions, and so on.  Each bottle features 100mg of organic, broad-spectrum, hemp-derived CBD paired with shea butter, vitamin E, essential oils, and more to soothe your dog’s skin when applied topically.

Read Less

settings.section_title: Application of Topical CBD for Pets
settings.text:
Nobody wants to see their beloved pet suffer, so when they itch, lick, or bite their skin, resulting in loss of fur and red, irritated skin, or even bleeding or oozing rashes, you naturally want to address this concern.  Short of putting them in the hated cone of shame, however, you might not be able to stop them from itching or gnawing at hot spots.

Sour, foul-tasting sprays are an option, but they rarely work well and they wear off quickly.  Instead, consider topical CBD for pets.  Relievet proudly offers a CBD Soothing Balm that you can apply directly to your pet’s skin for immediate and lasting relief of itching and irritation.  You should always see your vet to discover the cause of skin irritation, and you may have to subscribe to other treatment regimens to address underlying issues.

Read More

In the meantime, our topical balm, which pairs natural, broad spectrum CBD with a number of soothing emollients, can be applied directly to problem areas 2-3 times a day or as needed to calm irritation and alleviate itch.  Your dog needn’t suffer the discomfort of skin irritation and you don’t have to live with the frustrations of trying to curb scratching and licking day and night.

Read Less

settings.section_title: Easy to Use CBD Drops for Pets
settings.text:
Any pet parent who has ever had to administer oral medications knows how difficult it can be to get all the medicine in your pet’s mouth and stop it from coming back out.  Relievet is dedicated to delivering CBD for pets that is designed with ease of use in mind.

For starters, our graduated dropper makes it easy to measure precisely so you can administer accurate doses for your dog or cat every time.  In addition, it is designed to deliver CBD oil sublingually (under the tongue), so you don’t have to try to stick a syringe down your pet’s throat, stressing everyone out in the process.

Read More

Finally, our dropper is plastic, not glass, eliminating the worry that your pet might accidentally bite down and end up with a mouthful of broken glass.  You want the best for your pets, and Relievet understands.  We create products that we’d use with our own pets so you can feel confident using them with yours.

Read Less

CBD for pets doesn’t have to come in a liquid form.  If you’re looking for a product that’s easier to ingest for pets that spit out liquids or won’t eat all their food with CBD oil on it, you’ll find that Relievet CBD Soft Chews are an ideal alternative.

Read More

Dogs love the natural, bacon flavor and each chew delivers 2mg of organic, broad-spectrum, hemp-derived CBD that is THC-free.  Whether you need an alternative to CBD oil that your dog will gobble up for maximum benefits, or you simply want to supplement daily dosing when your pet’s need is greater, pet treats offer the easiest way to administer oral CBD for pets.

Read Less

settings.title: Monica Soucy RVT
settings.text: Monica is a one of the co-founders of Relievet. She is a registered veterinary technician who has devoted her life to working with animals. She was inspired by the dogs and cats she works with every day to create products to improve their quality of life.
